DOC.brief_summary: Determination of frequency of Clopidigrel- and Acetacylicacid-non-responders (HOTPR) in acute ischemic stroke patients.
DOC.brief_title: Non-responders to Antiplatelet Treatment in Acute Ischaemic Stroke)
DOC.detailed_description: Determination of frequency of Clopidigrel- and Acetacylicacid-non-responders (HOTPR) in acute ischemic stroke patients using the VerifyNow system.
DOC.criteria: Suspected acute ischemic stroke and loading dose of Clopidogrel or Acetacylicacid Previous treatment with platelet inhibitor NOAC or Vitamin Kantagonist treatment Final diagnosis other than Ischemoc stroke or Transitoric ischemic attack
